overview: Available on YouTube, Media’s Influence on the Mind is a short film focused on exploring the case of Callum Ford and how an obsession with the movie American Psycho placed him down a dark path. Along with a psychoanalytical view on the situation as a whole.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jhVR3ZP_WGE&t=3s
title: Media’s Influence on the Mind
